title: Episode 182: Larry Ray and the Sarah Lawrence Cult - Part 1
description:
When their roommate asked if her dad could crash until he got back on his feet, seven students at Sarah Lawrence College obliged. Over the next decade, many of their lives would be turned upside down as they were lured into his web of exploitation, abuse, manipulation, and torture. 

We're going on tour! Click here for the list of cities we'll be visiting and to purchase tickets!
